entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
